name: Music Industry Final Project
description:
This is an interactive presentation created to showcase the use of Virtual Reality for unique music experiences created for my final for The Rise and Fall of the Music Industry.

As these engines that were traditionally designed for video game creation become more accessible, more artist can create unique interactive experiences to support music projects. With this and the growth of VR many types of interactive music experiences can be created to supplement albums, similar to a music video.

In this experience, you will see a gallery on the current status of the VR Industry, and a short interactive music experience to demonstrate its usage. All of this was created by myself, and can be recreated without expert coding ability.
